targets.query: SELECT last("modulation") AS "modulation", last("frequency") AS "frequency", last("uncorrectables") AS "uncorrectables", last("corrected") AS "corrected",  last("power") AS "power",  last("snr") AS "snr" FROM "downstream_statistics"  GROUP BY "channel_id" fill(none)
SELECT last("channel_type") AS "channel_type", last("frequency") AS "frequency", last("width") AS "width",  last("power") AS "power" FROM "upstream_statistics"  GROUP BY "channel_id" fill(none)
SELECT mean("corrected") FROM "downstream_statistics" WHERE ("channel_id" =~ /^$downstream_channel$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "channel_id" fill(null)
SELECT mean("corrected") FROM "downstream_statistics" WHERE ("channel_id" =~ /^$downstream_channel$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "channel_id" fill(null)

SELECT mean("corrected") FROM "downstream_statistics" WHERE ("channel_id" =~ /^$downstream_channel$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "channel_id" fill(null)
SELECT "time_d_t" AS "Date Time", "id" AS "id", "level", "desc" FROM "event_log" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)

list.definition: select DISTINCT("channel_id") from (select power, channel_id from downstream_statistics WHERE $timeFilter)
list.name: downstream_channel
list.query: select DISTINCT("channel_id") from (select power, channel_id from downstream_statistics WHERE $timeFilter)

list.definition: select DISTINCT("channel_id") from (select power, channel_id from upstream_statistics WHERE $timeFilter)
list.name: upstream_channel
